message: Hi Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $130. I can do $142, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $137?
I'm not quite willing to meet you in the middle, but I can do $139. That's as close as I can get to meeting you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to get closer to my target price. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $136?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $139, but I can give you a slight discount. I'll meet you at $138, and that's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $138 and my original offer of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at $134?
